// src/components/HowToPlay.js import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './HowToPlay.css'; // Import sample images (replace with your actual screenshots) import signupImg from '../assets/signup-screenshot.png'; import loginImg from '../assets/login-screenshot.png'; import createGameImg from '../assets/create-game-screenshot.png'; import joinGameImg from '../assets/join-game-screenshot.png'; import gameplayImg from '../assets/gameplay-screenshot.png'; import leaderboardImg from '../assets/leaderboard-screenshot.png'; const HowToPlay = () => { return (
{/* Navigation Bar */}

NUMBERPOSITION

Home How to Play Leaderboard About

How to Play NUMBER POSITION

01

Getting Started

Sign Up

Create your account using the signup form. You'll need:

  • Unique username
  • Valid email address
  • Secure password

Log In

Access your account using your credentials:

  • Registered email
  • Account password

02

Game Setup

Create a Game

Start a new game session:

  1. Click "Create New Game"
  2. Wait for game ID generation
  3. Share ID with your opponent

Join a Game

Enter an existing game:

  1. Click "Join Existing Game"
  2. Enter valid game ID
  3. Wait for host approval

03

Gameplay

Rules

  • Create a 4-digit secret number with unique digits
  • Take turns guessing opponent's number
  • Receive feedback on each guess:
    • Numbers Correct (C)
    • Positions Correct (P)
  • First to guess correctly wins!

04

Leaderboards

Track your progress and compete with others:

  • Wins/Losses/Draws statistics
  • Global ranking system
  • Special achievements

Ready to Play?

Start Playing Now
